content:
I'm a Sophomore at Columbia Universty majoring in computer science and concentrating in mathematics. Most of my experience is in systems
programming, but I enjoy all forms of coding!
Thank you for visiting Bea Dot Com!
You can reach me at beatricestotz@gmail.com or at 571-969-9951

Advanced Systems Programming Implementing Unix libraries and tools (malloc, grep, debugger, linker) Advanced I/O, piping, multiplexing Basics of linux container system Fundamentals of Computer Systems Digital logic design and optimization Processor design and assembly language Basics of computer architecture Advanced Programming Introduction to C, Unix fundamentals, and networking Implementing a database lookup server Data Structures in Java Introduction to higher level data structures in Java (hash maps, trees, linked lists, etc) Overview and implementation of sorting algorithms

Dire Date Night demo out now! You’re 15 minutes late to a blind date with a girl that you have absolutely no chemistry with. Also she’s secretly a werewolf. Navigate awkward conversations and touchy subjects with your stone-faced date, and if you’re lucky you might be able to salvage the night
Visit the itch.io page to play!
Created using RenPy. All programming and art by me, dialogue written with the help of my girlfriend.
Dire Date Night main menu Timed dialogue options Try not to scare off your date
